novice.title: Landing Page
novice.desc: Design and code a landing page for a fictional product or service. Focus on making it responsive so it looks good on various devices and screen sizes. This project emphasizes responsive design principles and CSS media queries.

novice.title: Simple Blog
novice.desc: Create a blog platform where users can read and write blog posts. This project involves building a user interface for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog posts, which reinforces CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.Create a blog platform where users can read and write blog posts. This project involves building a user interface for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog posts, which reinforces CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations.

resources.name: How To Create A Blog Section Using HTML and CSS
Blog Page Website - Imaji Coffee Website

novice.title: Personal Website
novice.desc: Create a simple website to introduce yourself or showcase your hobbies. This project focuses on the basics of HTML and CSS, allowing you to learn about page structure, formatting, and styling. It's a great way to build your confidence in web development and familiarize yourself with the fundamental building blocks.

novice.title: Online Quiz
novice.desc: Develop a simple online quiz with multiple choice questions. This project helps you practice basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript by creating an interactive interface for users to answer questions and receive feedback. It's a good way to learn about user interactions and explore basic functionalities in web development.

resources.name: Create a Simple Quiz with JavaScript

novice.title: Weather App
novice.desc: Develop a web application to display weather information for a specific location. This project introduces fetching data from APIs and displaying it in a user-friendly format.

resources.name: Build a Weather App with JavaScript and OpenWeatherMap API

novice.title: Simple Calculator
novice.desc: Create a web calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations. This project helps practice user interaction and basic JavaScript functionalities.

resources.name: Build a Calculator App with JavaScript

novice.title: To-Do List with Local Storage
novice.desc: Develop a to-do list app that allows users to create and manage tasks. This project introduces local storage to persist tasks even after refreshing the page.

resources.name: To-Do List App with Local Storage
Building a To-Do List with Local Storage - Tutorial

novice.title: Responsive Menu
novice.desc: Design and implement a menu that adapts its layout and behavior based on the screen size (responsive design principles).

resources.name: Build a Responsive Navigation Menu with CSS

novice.title: Text-based Game (Tic-Tac-Toe)
novice.desc: Develop a simple text-based game like Tic-Tac-Toe. This project introduces game design and logic implementation using JavaScript.

resources.name: Build a Tic-Tac-Toe Game with JavaScript

novice.title: Unit Converter
novice.desc: Create a web application to convert values between different units (e.g., length, temperature, currency).

resources.name: Build a Unit Converter with JavaScript

novice.title: Simple Form Validation
novice.desc: Develop a basic form with validation (e.g., checking required fields). This project introduces front-end validation techniques using JavaScript.

novice.title: Animated Landing Page
novice.desc: Create a landing page with basic animations using CSS animations or JavaScript libraries (GSAP).

resources.name: Animate a Landing Page with CSS
